roleset.name: shoot at sporadically
roleset.note: SNIPE-V NOTES: based on sentences in wsj. No appropriate VNcls. Updated by Julia,11/2010. (from snipe.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: In the mid-1980s, after ABC had just bid a record $309 million for the 1988 Winter Games, he sniped at rivals for paying reckless prices.
example.arg: after ABC had just bid a record $309 million for the 1988 Winter Games
